subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin scored another spectacular, how-did-he-do-that goal while sliding on the ice, helping the host Washington Capitals to a shootout win over the Montreal Canadiens.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin scored another spectacular, how-did-he-do-that goal while sliding on the ice, helping the host Washington Capitals to a shootout win over the Montreal Canadiens.
